rawContent:

811 - will say to go to the ER
Pharmacist - it's a 50/50 chance

rawContent:
People who have a VirtualCareNS account can login and request an appointment with a primary care provider for their health care needs.

To use VirtualCareNS you must live in Nova Scotia, be without a primary care provider and be on the Need a Family Practice Registry. 

[2/3]
